extraction.title: Battery charging status
extraction.description: The battery status is a nice information, but in order to be really useful, it should have also a "charging status".So I could forget about my phone, and only receive notifications when its discharging bellow some level.Now, when I activate battery alarm, I receive a lot of alarms even with my phone connected and charging.Regards
extraction.comments: Thanks for your feedback. While this might indeed be a cool feature, we will currently not implement this; we think alerting on low-batt should be enough. ;-)
